body: Victory for LGBTI people in Uganda: "The High Court of Uganda ruled that the Rolling Stone had violated the constitutional rights to privacy and safety and has awarded the three plaintiffs damages of £400 each plus a warning to the magazine not to repeat the outings."
original_body: Victory for LGBTI people in Uganda: "The High Court of Uganda ruled that the Rolling Stone had violated the constitutional rights to privacy and safety and has awarded the three plaintiffs damages of £400 each plus a warning to the magazine not to repeat the outings."
title: Uganda: LGBTI win court case over Rolling Stone
